heading: HR01246
0: A RESOLUTION CALLING FOR THE ADOPTION OF A THIRD PARTY INSPECTION SYSTEM OF CARGO FROM THE POINT OF ORIGIN FOR ALL SHIPMENTS TO THE PHILIPPINES IN ORDER TO STOP IMPORTATION OF ILLEGAL GOODS; COUNTER GRAFT AND CORRUPTION; AND INCREASE REVENUES OF THE GOVERNMENT

FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION CALLING FOR THE ADOPTION OF A THIRD PARTY INSPECTION SYSTEM OF CARGO FROM THE POINT OF ORIGIN FOR ALL SHIPMENTS TO THE PHILIPPINES IN ORDER TO STOP IMPORTATION OF ILLEGAL GOODS; COUNTER GRAFT AND CORRUPTION; AND INCREASE REVENUES OF THE GOVERNMENT
